long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sand Tetris offers a unique twist on the classic Tetris gameplay, immersing players in a desert-themed challenge where sand blocks fall, and strategic moves shape the arid landscape. Dive into this engaging puzzle game that adds a new layer of creativity to the beloved Tetris concept.

Game Controls
Master the controls to manipulate the sand blocks:

Arrow Keys: Move the falling sand block left or right.
Down Arrow Key: Accelerate the descent of the sand block.
Up Arrow Key: Rotate the sand block to fit into the landscape.

How to Play
Falling Sand Blocks: Navigate and strategically position falling sand blocks to create complete horizontal lines.
Line Completion: When a horizontal line is filled with sand blocks, it disappears, and you earn points.
Challenges and Levels: Progress through increasingly challenging levels, introducing new obstacles and sand block variations.
Game Over: Be cautious—allowing the sand blocks to reach the top of the screen results in a game over.
